IPHB Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Lecturer Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 26, 2025, 17:27 IST
 Institute of Psychiatry & Human Behaviour
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 26-Aug-2025 |  Goa |  Salary : 95,000 to 95,000




FOLLOW

The Institute of Psychiatry and Human Behaviour (IPHB) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Lecturer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MD can grab this chance and apply for the IPHB Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible aspirants can attend the walk-in at the address given below.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Karnataka

IPHB Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Lecturer	01	MD

Age Limit for the IPHB Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 45 years.

Selection Process for the IPHB Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the IPHB Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 25,000 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 1,50,000 /-per month.

Application fee for the IPHB Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the IPHB Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Lecturer Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Then, attend the walk-in at the address given below, along with the relevant documents 

Important Dates

Date of Interview	04-09-2025
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
